    9: -module(basic_SUITE).
   10: -author("ludwikbukowski").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   13: 
   14: 
   15: -define(FILE_C,code:priv_dir(iot)++"/driver").
   16: -define(FILE_MOCK,code:priv_dir(iot)++"/driver_mock").
   17: -define(DRIVER_S,driver_server).
   18: -define(MANAGER_S, driver_manager).
   19: %% API
   20: -export([all/0, simple_test/1, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, driver_receive_test/1, close_port_test/1, var_receive_test/1, check_port_test/1, error_receive_test1/1, driver_send_test1/1, driver_send_test2/1, whole_echo_test/1]).
   21: 
   22: groups()->[{communication,[sequence],[check_port_test,driver_receive_test,var_receive_test,
   23:   driver_send_test1,driver_send_test2,whole_echo_test,close_port_test]}].
   24: 
   25: all()->[simple_test,{group,communication}].
   26: 
   27: 
   28: %% Init
   29: init_per_suite(Config)->
   30:   ok = application:start(meck),
   31:   ok = application:start(iot),
   32:   Config.
   33: 
   34: end_per_suite(_)->
   35:   ok = application:stop(iot),
   36:   ok = application:stop(meck).
   37: 
   38: 
   39: init_per_group(communication,Config)->
   40:  % meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   41:   %meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,openport,fun()->gen_server:call(driver_manager,{openport,?FILE_MOCK}) end),
   42:   ?MANAGER_S:openport(),
   43:  % meck:unload(?MANAGER_S),
   44:   Config.
   45: 
   46: end_per_group(communication,_)->
   47:   ?DRIVER_S:closeport(),
   48:   ok.
   49: 
   50: 
   51: 
   52: %% Tests
   53: simple_test(_)->
   54:   true = is_pid(whereis(zeus_supervisor)),
   55:   true = is_pid(whereis(?MANAGER_S)).
   56: 
   57: %% Driver_server side
   58: check_port_test(_)->
   59:   List = ?DRIVER_S:getport(),
   60:   1 = length(List),
   61:   [Port] = List,
   62:   true = is_port(Port).
   63: 
   64: driver_receive_test(_) ->                                                   %% Receive data from fake driver
   65:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   66:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   67:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),                       %% Mock Var_server response
   68:   ?DRIVER_S ! {some_port,{data,<<"Hej!">>}},
   69:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
   70:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S),
   71:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
   72: 
   73: %% Var Server side
   74: var_receive_test(_)->                                                       %% Receiving data from var server
   75:   ?MANAGER_S:adddata({some_port,{data,<<"Hi there!">>}}),
   76:   [{some_port,{data,<<"Hi there!">>}}] = ?MANAGER_S:getdata().
   77: 
   78: %% Mixed
   79: 
   80: 
   81: driver_send_test1(_)->                                                          %% Sending data to mocked driver (without handling answer)
   82:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   83:   meck:expect(?DRIVER_S,call_port,fun(_,_)->{reply,{someport,{data,<<"Some funny stuff.">>}}} end),
   84:   {_,{data,<<"Some funny stuff.">>}} = ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Some funny stuff."),
   85:     meck:unload(?DRIVER_S).
   86: 
   87: driver_send_test2(_)->                                                       %% Sending data to movked driver (without passing to var server)
   88:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   89:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),
   90:   ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Some well-known movie quote."),
   91:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
   92: 
   93: whole_echo_test(_)->                                                         %% Send data to driver, get answer and pass to var server
   94:   {_,{data,_}} = ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Rolling Stones roxs"),
   95:   [_,{_,{data,<<"Rolling Stones roxs">>}}] = driver_manager:getdata().
   96: 
   97: close_port_test(_)->
   98:   [] = ?DRIVER_S:closeport().
   99: 
  100: 
  101: error_receive_test1(_) ->                                                %% TODO Test crashes
  102:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
  103:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S ,[unstick,passthrough]),
  104:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),
  105:   ?DRIVER_S ! {'EXIT',some_port, normal},
  106:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
  107:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
